title: Add CRM field mapping auto-discovery and mapping suggestions during setup

sections.text: Implement an onboarding step that auto-discovers standard and commonly used CRM fields (e.g., stage, close date, amount, owner, last activity) and proposes default mappings to Sales_Accelerator’s canonical schema. Surface confidence indicators and allow quick accept/edit for each suggested mapping before saving. This reduces manual setup effort and establishes the required foundation for benchmarks and stage-based guidance in later setup steps.
